Name: Adrenaline Maximum
Desc:
Pushes the limits of Adrenaline Boost by unlocking the power of combos and the full power of Maha.
While in Adrenaline Boost, landing a certain number of attacks will enter the Super Awakening mode, where Maha's full power can be unleashed.
While in Super Awakening, you can use the Hyper Boost End skill and Maha's power will turn into a golden flash of light, dealing additional DAMAGE to enemies.
The duration of Adrenaline Boost is not affected by the duration of Super Awakening.
Super Awakening is not affected by Buff Duration Bonus effects.
Required Skill: Lv. 20 Adrenaline Boost or higher
Lv. 30 Effect: Can learn the Hyper skill, Hyper Boost End - Last Stand.

H.Old:
Enter Super Awakening after landing 10 or more attacks during Adrenaline Boost.
Super Awakening: Lasts for 5 sec. Enables Hyper Boost End. Direct attack skills activate Gold Flash every 1.2 sec.
Golden Flash: Attacks up to 12 enemies at 650% DAMAGE 10 times.
Cooldown: 180 sec. Super Awakening cooldown is indicated by the border of Adrenaline Boost Activate.
[Passive Effects: Ice Wave DAMAGE +320%p]
H.New:
Enter Super Awakening after landing 10 or more attacks during Adrenaline Boost.
Super Awakening: Lasts for 5 sec. Enables Hyper Boost End. Direct attack skills activate Gold Flash every 0.8 sec.
Golden Flash: Attacks up to 12 enemies at 650% Damage 10 times.
Cooldown: 180 sec. Super Awakening cooldown is indicated by the border of Adrenaline Boost Activate.
[Passive Effects: Ice Wave Damage +320%p]
